wikitext.*:
<includeonly>{{#invoke:loop|main|{{{1}}}={{{2}}}|{{
safesubst:#if:{{safesubst:#invoke:String|match|s={{safesubst:#expr: {{{2}}} + {{{3}}} +({{safesubst:#ifexpr: {{{3}}} >= 0 | -1 | 1 }}) }}|pattern=^-?%d+%.?%d*$|match=1|plain=false|ignore_errors=true}}
  |{{safesubst:#expr: {{{2}}} + {{{3}}} +({{safesubst:#ifexpr: {{{3}}} >= 0 | -1 | 1 }}) }}
  |{{safesubst:#if:{{safesubst:#invoke:String|match|s={{safesubst:#expr: {{{3}}} +({{safesubst:#ifexpr: {{{3}}} >= 0 | -1 | 1 }}) }}|pattern=^-?%d+%.?%d*$|match=1|plain=false|ignore_errors=true}}
    |{{#expr: {{{2}}} + {{safesubst:#expr: {{{3}}} +({{safesubst:#ifexpr: {{{3}}} >= 0 | -1 | 1 }}) }} }}
    |{{#expr: {{{2}}} + {{{3}}} +({{#ifexpr: {{{3}}} >= 0 | -1 | 1 }}) }}
  }}
}}|{{
safesubst:#if:{{{{safesubst:#invoke:String|match|s={{safesubst:#ifexpr: {{{3}}} >= 0 | 1 | -1 }}|pattern=^-?%d+%.?%d*$|match=1|plain=false|ignore_errors=true}}
  |{{safesubst:#ifexpr: {{{3}}} >= 0 | 1 | -1 }}
  |{{#ifexpr: {{{3}}} >= 0 | 1 | -1 }}
}}|do=<now</includeonly><includeonly>iki>{{{4}}}</nowiki>}} }}</includeonly><noinclude>
{{doc|Template:Loop/doc}}[[分类:必须被替换引用的模板]]
</noinclude>
